name: EbertBattleAnuki
_source: s;Ebert;Lady Morrissey. It is not too late to withdraw your support.{w}{br}This idiotic scheme would collapse without you.
s;Anuki;Not happening. I've been waiting for this.
s;Ebert;You are impressively loyal to Verstadt.{w}{br}Especially for a political marriage.
s;Anuki;No, Ebert, that's not why.{w} It's because I want to feel your skull give way to my axe.
